posts.title: Posts can be bigger now
posts.content: Yup I just finished making a thing. Click here to see it.

posts.title: Happy new year!
posts.content: It's 2021 now! That means this site's been up for just over a year! ðŸ¥³

posts.title: PokÃ©mon thingy
posts.content: Check the projects page to find my first ever python project to use pygame - how did I do?

posts.title: Discord Mk2
posts.content: Just realised I never put a link to the other discord servers. Here's the BotBiscuit server, and here's the general hangout server.

posts.title: Why another redesign?
posts.content: A: I can make things more responsive now, B: the old design wasn't exactly going to win any awards for good design.

posts.title: New stuff!?
posts.content: BotBiscuit's public now, so I thought I'd make a manual for it. It has its own site here, and I'm currently working on making the manual which will eventually be able to be accessed from that page.

posts.title: Discord bots!
posts.content: Yup! A couple friends and I decided to have a semi-competition to make a Discord bot. I've linked to their respective discord servers on a project page, which you should be able to find either by going to projects and clicking on the right project, or by following this link.

posts.title: Site redesign!
posts.content: Why does everything look different?!? Quite simply, the old version of this site was absolutely awful. It looked a bit.. uh.. ehh... and it wasn't exactly what I'd call responsive. This newer version should fix those problems, whilst also giving me the ability to add fancy new things! Yay!

posts.title: DISCORD!!!!
posts.content: There's a Discord now! Find it here!

posts.title: I'm still alive
posts.content: Well I haven't put anything here in forever, but I though I'd just put something here to prove I'm still alive. Only issue is that I never finish projects...

posts.title: Yay! Projects!
posts.content: The first project is up! Head to the projects page to have a look.

posts.title: Happy New Year!
posts.content: It's now 2020! And that's literally all I wanted to say.

posts.title: SOSC is a thing now!
posts.content: Saviours of the Sword Coast has begun! There should be a recap <abbr title="SOSC recaps are not currently available."><del>here</del></abbr>

posts.title: Hello!
posts.content:
I've done it! Finally! A website to host projects! It may or may not have taken me four/five years, but I did it! Finally!
My idea is that I can use this site to show off host my projects, and they and their source code (hopefully) can be downloaded via a link I will hopefully remember to provide for each one.
